version_description:
1. Added new feature "Personal cards", you can decide to send the cards to the people you trust. 
2. Added the "Distance Priority" function to help users narrow down the search results.
3. Added notification for the "Hook me up" game.
4. Fixed some minor bugs and did some performance optimizations.

1. Fixed some minor bugs on notification settings and messages.
2. Added a switch for "personal card" notification. Users can turn off the notifications when receiving new cards.
3. Added in-app purchase for some features. HMU now offers 2 ways to access certain features: Coins and Premium membership.
4. Changed the notification sound.
5. Improved the app performance.

1. Added a new feature "Boost", it offers more chance to boost your profile on HOT list.
2. Fixed some minor bugs.
3. Improved app performance.

1. Fixed bugs on "Boost" and "Personal cards" features.
2. Some improvements on app performance.

1. Fixed minor bugs.
2. Improved the system message for Photo rejection.

Thanks for visiting HMU. On this new version, we redesigned our app and added two main features. Now we dedicate to help you find your community, expand your connections and keep in touch with your friends by multiple ways such as video chat, instant messages and so on. 

1. Added a new feature "Community". You can check and join the communities you are interested in, like football, soccer, LOL, rock music and so on.
2. Added Video Chat feature. Start video chat with your friends or strangers with different cultures, keep in touch.
3. Redesigned our logo, user list, my center and message page, the bottom navigation bar and some icons.
4. Also some performance improvements on both server side and application side.

Welcome to HMU - the fast-growing local hookup app for people building new connections, making new friends. Please see the new changes on this new update:

1. Redesigned the navigation bar for the user list. 
2. Fixed a display issue on the bottom tab bar for iOS 14 users. 
3. Fixed the bug on "Notification" and "about us" items in Settings section. 
4. Some improvements on UI and features.
